xal.tools.math

Class ErrorPropagator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.tools.math.ErrorPropagator

  • public class ErrorPropagator
extends java.lang.Object
    Propagates errors from independent source variables to the specified operation using standard error propagation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorPropagator(DifferentiableOperation baseOperation, DifferentiableVariable... sourceVariables)
      Constructor

      • ErrorPropagator

        public ErrorPropagator(DifferentiableOperation baseOperation,
                       DifferentiableVariable... sourceVariables)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        baseOperation - the operation for which the error propagation will be performed
        sourceVariables - independent variables from which source errors are to be propagated

        Set the default variance for the specified source variable
        Parameters:
        sourceVariable - variable for which to assign the variance

      • setSourceVariances

        public void setSourceVariances(double... sourceVariances)
        Set the default variances for the source variables
        Parameters:
        sourceVariances - the variances to each source in the order they were specified in the constructor

      • setCommonSourceVariance

        public void setCommonSourceVariance(double variance)
        Set a common variance to use as the default for all source variables

      • setCommonSourceSigma

      • setSourceSigma

        public void setSourceSigma(DifferentiableVariable sourceVariable,
                           double sigma)
        Set the default standard deviation for the specified source variable
        Parameters:
        sourceVariable - variable for which to assign the variance
        sigma - standard deviation to assign the variable

      • getVariance

        public double getVariance()
        Calculate the operation variance propagated from the default source variances

      • getVarianceWithCommonSourceVariance

        public double getVarianceWithCommonSourceVariance(double sourceVariance)
        Calculate the operation variance propagated from a common source variance. Note that this assignment is only for the current calculation and does change the default source variances.

      • getVarianceWithSourceVariances

        public double getVarianceWithSourceVariances(double... sourceVariances)
        Calculate the operation variance propagated from the source variances. Note that this assignment is only for the current calculation and does change the default source variances.

      • getSigma

        public double getSigma()
        Calculate the operation standard error propagated from the default source variances
